answers.answer: listen girl i have plenty of friends with type 1 diabetes and they check there stuff all the time there is nothing wrong with you if they think of you any different then there not the right type of friends you dont need to hide it its nothing to be ashamed.

question: Hi I'm 13  and I have type on diabetes and when I'm with my friends it's hard to check my blood sugar or take insulin because I don't want them to know or treat me different. How do you try not to make your friend or friends see you do that stuff
title: How to you keep it a Secret
